snippet.title: tLotD Origins Trailer 2024
snippet.description: Embark on an adventure like no other in this immersive hand-drawn action RPG. Prepare for thrilling aerial Souls-like combat and exploration that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Enjoy a hand-crafted art set within an intricate lore in this 6-8 hour game perfect as a warm-up for longer titles
